contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact_page.address_value: Opp. Saibaba Mandir, Kamothe, Navi Mumbai

about_page.title: About Us
about_page.subtitle: Who We Are
about_page.intro_desc_1: Krishna Enterprises is a leading provider of civil contracting, fabrication, aluminium work, and interior design services. We are committed to delivering high-quality construction solutions that meet the diverse needs of our clients.
about_page.intro_desc_2: With years of experience in the industry, we pride ourselves on our attention to detail, timely completion of projects, and customer satisfaction.
about_page.mission_desc: To deliver superior construction and design services with integrity, innovation, and excellence.
about_page.vision_desc: To be the most trusted name in the civil and interior infrastructure industry.

services_page.title: Our Services
services_page.subtitle: What We Do
services_page.civil_desc: Complete civil construction services including structural work, renovations, and repairs. We ensure structural integrity and durability in all our projects.
services_page.fabrication_desc: Custom metal fabrication for gates, grills, railings, and structural steel needs. Precision and strength are our top priorities.
services_page.aluminium_desc: Modern aluminium sliding windows, partitions, and doors that offer aesthetics, durability, and smooth functionality for homes and offices.
services_page.interior_desc: Transform your space with our interior design and custom furniture solutions. We create beautiful, functional environments tailored to your taste.

blog_page.title: Our Blog
blog_page.subtitle: Latest News & Insights
blog_page.blog_1_excerpt: Planning a renovation? Here are the top 5 things you need to consider before starting your dream home makeover.
blog_page.blog_2_excerpt: Why modern homes are switching to aluminium sliding windows for durability and aesthetics.
blog_page.blog_3_excerpt: How we ensure the highest safety standards at all our construction sites to protect our workers and clients.

faq_page.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_page.subtitle: Common Questions
faq_page.q1: What types of civil work do you undertake?
faq_page.a1: We undertake all types of civil contracting work including residential complexes, commercial buildings, structural repairs, and renovations.
faq_page.q2: Do you provide custom fabrication solutions?
faq_page.a2: Yes, we specialize in custom metal fabrication for gates, grills, railings, and structural steel needs tailored to your specific requirements.
faq_page.q3: What is the warranty on aluminium windows?
faq_page.a3: Our aluminium sliding windows come with a standard 5-year warranty on the profile and 1-year warranty on hardware components.
faq_page.q4: How do you charge for your services?
faq_page.a4: Our pricing is transparent and project-based. We provide a detailed quotation after inspecting the site and understanding your requirements.
faq_page.q5: What is the typical timeline for a project?
faq_page.a5: Timelines vary depending on the scope. Small renovations may take 2-4 weeks, while larger construction projects can take several months. We provide a schedule before starting.

single_service_page.title: Civil Contracting
single_service_page.subtitle: Service Details
single_service_page.description_1: Our civil contracting services act as the backbone of your construction project. We handle everything from the initial foundation to the final structural finishes, ensuring improved stability and longevity.
single_service_page.description_2: We specialize in residential and commercial building construction, leveraging modern techniques and high-quality materials to deliver superior results.

single_project_page.title: Residential Complex
single_project_page.subtitle: Project Details
single_project_page.description_1: This comprehensive residential complex project involved the construction of 5 interconnected towers with over 200 units. Our team managed the entire lifecycle from structural skeleton to premium finishing.
single_project_page.description_2: The project emphasizes sustainable living with eco-friendly materials, rainwater harvesting systems, and energy-efficient lighting installed throughout the common areas.

single_blog_page.title: 5 Tips for Home Renovation
single_blog_page.subtitle: Blog Details
single_blog_page.quote: Renovation is not just about changing the look, it is about improving the way you live.
single_blog_page.content_1: Planning a home renovation can be both exciting and overwhelming. Whether you are updating a single room or remodeling your entire house, proper planning is key to a successful project. Here are 5 essential tips to get you started.
single_blog_page.content_2: First, establish a realistic budget. It is important to know how much you are willing to spend and to set aside a contingency fund for unexpected expenses. Second, prioritize your needs versus your wants. Focus on essential repairs and improvements that add value to your home.
single_blog_page.content_3: Third, hire the right professionals. A skilled contractor can make a huge difference in the quality and timeline of your project. Fourth, consider energy efficiency. Upgrading to energy-efficient windows and appliances can save you money in the long run.
single_blog_page.content_4: Finally, be patient. Renovations take time, and there will likely be some disruptions to your daily routine. Keep the end goal in mind and enjoy the process of transforming your home.
